name: The Beginning of an Undertaking
description:
This is a little management game, based around managing a small funeral home, with a little twist. The current gameplay is a small slice of the greater plan which could grow to include more burial options, animated burials, etc...

We are open to any and all feedback with the gameplay and/or look of the graveyard-related models.

This game was created by two people (a programmer and 3d modeller) in 10 days as part of the GameDev.tv game jam, and as per the rules of the jam, here is the source for the game jam build of the game: https://github.com/LifelikeGames/DIOTB

Note: The Windows version of the game is untested as none of the creators uses a Windows machine (but it should work, since the was created in Unity).
